S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureCatalogue.S100FC:name: Extracts from Feature Catalogue for S-127 for S-100 4.0.0 samples

S100CI:address.S100CI:deliveryPoint: International Hydrographic Organization, 4 quai Antoine 1er, B.P. 445

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Administrative Division
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Administrative division is a generic term for an administrative region within a country at a level below that of the sovereign state.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Application profile
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource (ISO 19115)

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Call Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The designated call name of a station, e.g. radio station, radar station, pilot.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: This is the name used when calling a radio station by radio i.e. "Singapore Pilots".

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Call sign
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The designated call-sign of a radio station.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Cardinal direction
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Principal and intermediate compass points.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: N
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: north

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NNE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: northnortheast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Northeast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: ENE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: eastnortheast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: E
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: east

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: ESE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: eastsoutheast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: southeast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SSE
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: southsoutheast

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: S
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: south

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SSW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: southsouthwest

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: southwest

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: WSW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: westsouthwest

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: W
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: west

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: WNW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: westnorthwest

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: northwest

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: NNW
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: northnorthwest

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of authority
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The type of person, government agency or organisation granted powers of managing or controlling access to and/or activity in an area

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: customs
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The agency or establishment for collecting duties, tolls. (Merriam-Websters online Dictionary 23rd February 2006, amended).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: border control
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The administration to prevent or detect and prosecute violations of rules and regulations at international boundaries (adapted from Merriam-Websters online Dictionary 23rd February 2006).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: police
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The department of government, or civil force, charged with maintaining public order. (Adapted from OED)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: port
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Person or corporation, owners of, or entrusted with or invested with the power of managing a port. May be called a Harbour Board, Port Trust, Port Commission, Harbour Commission, Marine Department (NP 100 8th Edition 14 Oct 2004)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: immigration
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The authority controlling people entering a country.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: health
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The authority with responsibility for checking the validity of the health declaration of a vessel and for declaring free pratique.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: coast guard
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Organisation keeping watch on shipping and coastal waters according to governmental law; normally the authority with reponsibility for search and rescue.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: agricultural
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The authority with responsibility for preventing infection of the agriculture of a country and for the protection of the agricultural interests of a country.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: military
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A military authority which provides control of access to or approval for transit through designated areas or airspace.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: private company
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A private or publicly owned company or commercial enterprise which exercises control of facilities, for example a callibration area.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: maritime police
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A governmental or military force with jurisdiction in territorial waters. Examples could include Gendarmerie Maritime, Carabinierie, and Guardia Civil.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: environmental
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An authority with responsibility for the protection of the environment.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fishery
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An authority with responsibility for the control of fisheries.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: finance
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an authority with responsibility for the control and movement of money.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: maritime
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A national or regional authority charged with administration of maritime affairs.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of navigation line
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of route guidance given to vessels

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: clearing line
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a straight line that marks the boundary between a safe and a dangerous area or that passes clear of a navigational danger.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: transit line
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a line passing through one or more fixed marks.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: leading line bearing a recommended track
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a line passing through one or more clearly defined objects, along the path of which a vessel can approach safely up to a certain distance off.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of restricted area
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The official legal status of each kind of restricted area defines the kind of restriction(s), e.g., the restriction for a 'game preserve' may be 'entering prohibited', the restriction for an 'anchoring prohibition area' is 'anchoring prohibited'.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Permitted values for status should be reviewed, some are probably irrelevant to MPAs without wrecks, obstructions, or any navigation aids

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: offshore safety zone
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: the area around an offshore installation within which vessels are prohibited from entering without permission special regulations protect installations within a safety zone and vessels of all nationalities are required to respect the zone.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: nature reserve
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a tract of land managed so as to preserve it's flora, fauna, physical features, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: bird sanctuary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a place where birds are bred and protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: game reserve
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a place where wild animals or birds hunted for sport or food are kept undisturbed for private use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: seal sanctuary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a place where seals are protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: degaussing range
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area, usually about two cables diameter, within which ships' magnetic fields may be measured sensing instruments and cables are installed on the sea bed in the range and there are cables leading from the range to a control position ashore.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: military area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area controlled by the military in which restrictions may apply.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: historic wreck area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area around certain wrecks of historical importance to protect the wrecks from unauthorized interference by diving, salvage or deposition (including anchoring).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: navigational aid safety zone
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area around a navigational aid which vessels are prohibited from entering.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: minefield
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area laid and maintained with explosive mines for defence or practice purposes.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: waiting area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area reserved for vessels waiting to enter a harbour.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: research area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area where marine research takes place.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fish sanctuary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a place where fish are protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: ecological reserve
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a tract of land managed so as to preserve the relation of plants and living creatures to each other and to their surroundings.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: swinging area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area where vessels turn.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: environmentally sensitive sea area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A generic term which may be used to describe a wide range of areas, considered sensitive for a variety of environmental reasons.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: particularly sensitive sea area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area that needs special protection through action by IMO because of its significance for regional ecological, socio-economic or scientific reasons and because it may be vulnerable to damage by international shipping activities.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: disengagement area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area near a fairway where vessels can go to clear the way or make an about turn and possibly return to a waiting area when nautical conditions impose it.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: port security area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:remarks: Capitalization in registry is inconsistent and definition is N/A

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: coral sanctuary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A place where coral is protected.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: recreation area
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area within which recreational activities regularly take place and therefore vessel movement may be restricted.
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:remarks: (Adapted from S-57 Edition 3.1, Appendix A – Chapter 2, Page 2.76, November 2000).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of routeing measure
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of routeing measures by type.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: archipelagic sea lane
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Sea lanes designated by an archipelagic State for the passage of ships and aircraft.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: deep water route
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A route within defined limits which has been accurately surveyed for clearance of sea bottom and submerged obstacles as indicated on the chart.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fairway system
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: That part of a river, harbour and so on, where the main navigable channel for vessels of larger size lies. It is also the usual course followed by vessels entering or leaving harbours, called “ship channel”.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: recommended route
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A navigation line, range system, or a recommended track, lane, or route.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: traffic separation scheme
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A scheme which aims to reduce the risk of collision in congested and/or converging areas by separating traffic moving in opposite, or nearly opposite, directions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: two-way route
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A route within defined limits inside which two way traffic is established, aimed at providing safe passage of ships through waters where navigation is difficult or dangerous.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of Traffic Separation Scheme
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: International classification of traffic separation scheme

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: IMO - Adopted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A defined Traffic Separation Scheme that has been adopted as an IMO routing measure.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: not IMO - adopted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a defined Traffic Separation Scheme that has not been adopted as an IMO routing measure.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of text
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of completeness of textual information in relation to the source.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: abstract or summary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A statement summarizing the important points of a text

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: extract
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An excerpt or excerpts from a text

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: full text
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The whole text

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: City name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of a town or city.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Communication channel
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A channel number assigned to a specific radio frequency, frequencies or frequency band.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The expected input is the specific VHF-Channel. The attribute 'communication channel' encodes the various VHF-channels used for communication.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact instructions
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Instructions provided on how to contact a particular person, organisation or service.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Country Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of a nation.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Date end
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The latest date on which an object (e.g., a buoy) will be present.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: This attribute is to be used to indicate the removal or cancellation of an object at a specific date in the future. See also 'periodic date end' (PEREND).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Date start
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The earliest date on which an object (e.g., a buoy) will be present.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: This attribute is to be used to indicate the deployment or implementation of an object at a specific date in the future. See also 'periodic date start' (PERSTA).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Delivery point
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Details of where post can be delivered such as the apartment, name and/or number of a street, building or PO Box.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Display name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A statement expressing if a feature name is to be displayed in certain system display settings or not

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Distance
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A linear extent of space

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: File Locator
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The string encodes the location of a fragment of text or other information in a support file.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: File Reference
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The string encodes the file name of an external text file that contains the text in English

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Fixed Date
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The date of an event.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Flip bearing
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The bearing at which text is re-located to the opposite side of a feature when screen display is oriented away from true north.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Headline
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Words set at the head of a passage or page to introduce or categorize

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Language
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The method of human communication, either spoken or written, consisting of the use of words in a structured and conventional way
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The language is encoded by a character code following ISO 639-3

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Linkage
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: location (address) for on-line access using a URL/URI address or similar addressing scheme. (Adapted from ISO 19115:2014.)

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: MMSI Code
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The Maritime Mobile Service Identity (MMSI) Code is formed of a series of nine digits which are transmitted over the radio path in order to uniquely identify ship stations, ship earth stations, coast stations, coast earth stations, and group calls. These identities are formed in such a way that the identity or part thereof can be used by telephone and telex subscribers connected to the general telecommunications network principally to call ships automatically.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Nationality
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The nationality of the specific object.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Name
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The individual name of a feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Name of resource
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Name of the online resource.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Online description
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Orientation uncertainty
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The best estimate of the accuracy of a bearing.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Picture caption
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Short description of the purpose of the image

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Picture information
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A set of information to provide credits to picture creator, copyright owner etc.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Postal code
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Known in various countries as a postcode, or ZIP code, the postal code is a series of letters and/or digits that identifies each postal delivery area.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Protocol
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: connection protocol to be used. Example: ftp, http get KVP, http POST, etc.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Protocol request
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Request used to access the resource. Structure and content depend on the protocol and standard used by the online resource, such as Web Feature Service standard.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Reported date
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The date that the item was observed, done, or investigated

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Restriction
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The official legal statute of each kind of restricted area.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Defines the kind of restriction(s), e.g., the restriction for 'a game preserve' may be 'entry prohibited', the restriction for an 'anchoring prohibition' is 'anchoring prohibited'. The complete information about the restriction(s), actually held in handbooks or other publications, may be encoded by the attribute 'TXTDSC'. A short explanation may be given by the use of the attribute 'INFORM'.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: anchoring prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which anchoring is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: anchoring restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which anchoring is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fishing prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which fishing is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fishing restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which fishing is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: trawling prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which trawling is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: trawling restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which trawling is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: entry prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which navigation and/or anchoring is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: entry restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: dredging prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which dredging is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: dredging restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which dredging is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: diving prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which diving is not permitted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: diving restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which diving is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: no wake
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: mariners must adjust the speed of their vessels to reduce the wave or wash which may cause erosion or disturb moored vessels.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: area to be avoided
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an IMO designated area to be avoided, defined as a routeing measure.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: construction prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: the erection of permanent or temporary fixed structures or artificial islands is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: discharging prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which discharging or dumping is prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: discharging restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which discharging or dumping is restricted in accordance with specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: industrial or mineral exploration/development prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which industrial or mineral exploration and development are prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: industrial or mineral exploration/development restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which industrial or mineral exploration and development is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: drilling prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which excavating a hole on the sea-bottom with a drill is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: drilling restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by an appropriate authority, within which excavating a hole on the sea-bottom with a drill is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: removal of historical artifacts prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which the removal of historical artifacts is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: cargo transhipment (lightering) prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area in which cargo transhipment (lightering) is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: dragging prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area in which the dragging of anything along the bottom, e.g. bottom trawling, is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: stopping prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area in which a vessel is prohibited from stopping.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: landing prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area in which landing is prohibited.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: speed restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which speed is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: overtaking prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which overtaking is generally prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: overtaking of convoys by convoys prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which overtaking between convoys prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: passing or overtaking prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which passing or overtaking is generally prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: berthing prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which vessels, assemblies of floating material or floating establishments may not berth.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: berthing restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which berthing is restricted

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: making fast prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which vessels, assemblies of floating material or floating establishments may not make fast to the bank.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: making fast restricted
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which making fast to the bank is restricted

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: turning prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a specified area designated by appropriate authority, within which all turning is generally prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: restricted fairway depth
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which the fairway depth is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: restricted fairway width
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an area within which the fairway width is restricted.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: use of spuds prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The use of anchoring spuds (telescopic piles) is prohibited

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: swimming prohibited
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An area in which swimming is prohibited

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Scale minimum
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The minimum scale at which the object may be used, e.g., for ECDIS presentation.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The modulus of the scale is indicated, that is 1:1 250 000 is encoded as 1250000.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Source
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: An identifier (publication, document, reference work, instrument, vessel, etc) from which information comes or is acquired.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Source type
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: type of the source

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: law or regulation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: treaty, convention, or international agreement; law or regulation issued by a national or other authority

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: official publication
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: publication not having the force of law, issued by an international organisation or a national or local administration

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: mariner report, confirmed
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Reported by mariner(s) and confirmed by another source

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: mariner report, not confirmed
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: reported by mariner(s) but not confirmed

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: industry publications and reports
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: shipping and other industry publication, including graphics, charts and web sites

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: remotely sensed images
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: information obtained from satellite images

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: photographs
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: information obtained from photographs

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: products issued by HO services
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: information obtained from products issued by Hydrographic Offices

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: news media
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: information obtained from news media

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: traffic data
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: information obtained from the analysis of traffic data

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Status
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The condition of an object at a given instant in time.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: permanent
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: intended to last or function indefinitely.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: occasional
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: acting on special occasions happening irregularly.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: recommended
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: presented as worthy of confidence, acceptance, use, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: not in use
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: no longer used for the purpose intended disused.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: periodic/intermittent
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: recurring at intervals.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: reserved
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: set apart for some specific use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: temporary
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: meant to last only for a time.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: private
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: not in public ownership or operation.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: mandatory
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: compulsory enforced.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: extinguished
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: no longer lit

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: illuminated
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: lit by floodlights, strip lights, etc.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: historic
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: famous in history of historical interest.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: public
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: belonging to, available to, used or shared by, the community as a whole and not restricted to private use.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: synchronized
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: occur at a time, coincide in point of time, be contemporary or simultaneous.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: watched
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: looked at or observed over a period of time especially so as to be aware of any movement or change.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: un-watched
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: usually automatic in operation, without any permanently-stationed personnel to superintend it.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: existence doubtful
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an object that has been reported but has not been definitely determined to exist.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: buoyed
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Marked by buoys

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A non-formatted digital text string

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Orientation value
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The angular distance measured from true north to the major axis of the object.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Pictorial representation
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Indicates whether a pictorial representation of the object is available.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The 'pictorial representation' could be a drawing or a photo. The string encodes the file name of an external graphic file (pixel/vector).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Sector bearing
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A sector is the part of a circle between two straight lines drawn from the centre to the circumference. Sector bearing specifies the limit of the sector. (Adapted from S-57 Edition 3.1, Appendix A – Chapter 2, Page 2.184, November 2000).
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: -The values given to the common limits of adjacent sectors should be identical. - The orientation of the bearing is from seaward to the central feature. This conforms with the method used in “List of Lights” publications. - A generic term such as “to shore” cannot be used; a specific bearing must be encoded. Where a light sector limit is defined as “to the shore”, it should be encoded using a value that ensures that, when the limit is drawn, it will fall entirely on land.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Source date
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The production date of the source, e.g., the date of measurement.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Variable Date
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A day which is not fixed in the Gregorian calendar.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Action or activity
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The action or activity of a vessel

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: navigating with a pilot
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Carrying a qualified pilot as part of the vessel navigation team.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: entering port
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigating a vessel into a port

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: leaving port
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigating a vessel out of a port.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: berthing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Attaching a vessel to a wharf or jetty

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: slipping
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Detaching a vessel from a wharf or jetty.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: anchoring
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Attaching a vessel to the seabed by means of an anchor and cable.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: weighing anchor
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Detaching a vessel from the seabed by recovering an anchor and cable.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: transiting
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigating a vessel along a route or through a narrow gap, such as under a bridge or through a lock.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: overtaking
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigating a vessel past another traveling broadly in the same direction.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: reporting
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Providing details such as the name, location or intentions of a vessel

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: working cargo
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Loading or unloading cargo

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: landing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Placing crew or passengers on shore

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: diving
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Placing a swimmer with an air supply below the sea surface.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fishing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Hunting or catching fish

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: discharging overboard
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Releasing anything into the sea; often ballast water; or spoil from dredging elsewhere.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: passing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Navigating a vessel past another traveling broadly in the opposite direction.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Category of RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The principal subject matter of regulations, restrictions, recommendations or nautical information

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: navigation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to navigation

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: communication
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to communication

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: environmental protection
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to environmental protection

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: wildlife protection
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to wildlife protection

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: security
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to security

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: customs
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to customs

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: cargo operation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to cargo operation

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: refuge
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to a place of safety or refuge

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: health
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to health

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: natural resources or exploitation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: natural resources or exploitation

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: port
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to a port

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: finance
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to finance

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: agriculture
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: pertaining to agriculture

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Online function
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: code for function performed by the online resource

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: download
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another. (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: information
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online information about the resource (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: offlineAccess
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: order
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online order process for obtaining the resource (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: search
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: completeMetadata
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: complete metadata provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: browseGraphic
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: browse graphic provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: upload
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online resource upload capability provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: emailService
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online email service provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: browsing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online browsing provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fileAccess
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online file access provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunication service
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of methods of communication over a distance by electrical, electronic, or electromagnetic means.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: voice
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The transfer or exchange of information by using sounds that are being made by mouth and throat when speaking

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: facsimile
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a system of transmitting and reproducing graphic matter (as printing or still pictures) by means of signals sent over telephone lines

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SMS
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Short Message Service, a form of text messaging communication on phones and mobile phones

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: data
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: facts or information used usually to calculate, analyze, or plan something

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: streamedData
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Streamed data is data that that is constantly received by and presented to an end-user while being delivered by a provider.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: telex
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a system of communication in which messages are sent over long distances by using a telephone system and are printed by using a special machine (called a teletypewriter)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: telegraph
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an apparatus, system, or process for communication at a distance by electric transmission over wire

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: email
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Messages and other data exchanged between individuals using computers in a network.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text justification
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The anchor point of a text string

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: left
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the start of the text string.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: centred
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the centre of the text string.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: right
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the end of the text string.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text type
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The attribute from which a text string is derived.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: (S-122) Remark: S-122 does not include light features and therefore listed value '2: light characteristic' is omitted from the S-122 application schema.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: feature name
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The attribute from which a text string is derived.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Bearing information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A bearing is the direction one object is from another object.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact address
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Direction or superscription of a letter, package, etc., specifying the name of the place to which it is directed, and optionally a contact person or organisation who should receive it. (Oxford English Dictionary, 2nd Ed., adapted).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Feature name
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute provides the name of an entity, defines the national language of the name, and provides the option to display the name at various system display settings.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Fixed date range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes single fixed period, as the date range between its sub-attributes.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: the sub-attributes date start and date end must be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY) and, optionally, 2 digits for the month (MM) (e.g. April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, the values are replaced with dashes (-).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Graphic
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Pictorial information such as a photograph, sketch, or other graphic, optionally accompanied by descriptive information about the graphic and the location relative to its subject from which it was made.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute provides additional textual information that cannot be provided using other allowable attributes for the feature, and defines the language of the text string.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: this complex attribute should be used, for example, to hold the information that is shown on paper charts by cautionary and explanatory notes.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Online resource
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about online sources from which a resource or data can be obtained.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The complex attribute describes the access to online resources according to ISO 19115.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Orientation
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The angular distance measured from true north to the major axis of the feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Periodic date range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes the active period for a seasonal feature (e.g. a buoy), as the dates between its sub-attributes
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The sub-attributes date start and date end should be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY), 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific year is required (that is, the feature is removed at the same time each year) the following two cases may be considered: - same day each year: ----MMDD - same month each year: ----MM-- This conforms to ISO 8601:2004.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: RxN Code
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A summary of the impact of the most common types of regulation, restriction, recommendation and nautical information on a vessel.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: This attribute converts the subject, topic, and effects of regulations, etc., from plain text or natural language into a set of categories.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Source indication
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about the source document, publication, or reference from which object data or textual material included or referenced in a dataset are derived

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Text content
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual material, or a pointer to a resource providing textual material. May be accompanied by basic information about its source and relationship to the source.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: textContent is intended to allow text passages from other publications to be included in, or referenced by, instances of feature or information types. Exactly one of sub-attributes onlineResource or information must be completed in one instance of textContent. Product specifications may restrict the use or content of onlineResource for security. For example, a product specification may forbid populating onlineResource. Product specification authors must consider whether applications using the data product may be prevented from accessing off-system resources by security policies.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The applicable RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The applicable regulation, restriction, recommendation or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Applies in location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location in which the information item applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Identifies
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s).

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Information provided for
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s) for which further information is required.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Positions
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Provides information
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an object that provides more information about the referencing feature or information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Additional information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between at least one instance of a geo feature and an instance of an information type.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: Role informationProvidedFor encodable only as a generic inverse association in feature objects in 3.0.0 datasets

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Associated RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between a geographic location and a regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: Role appliesInLocation encodable only as a generic inverse association in 3.0.0 datasets as it is an information->feature link

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Text association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between a geo feature and the cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Information Type
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Generalized information type which carries all the common attributes

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: AbstractRxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: An abstract superclass for information types that encode rules, recommendations, and general information in text or graphic form.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:remarks: Subtypes of AbstractRxN carry the same attributes, but differ in the nature of information they encode. There are currently four such subtypes: Regulations, Restrictions, Recommendations, and NauticalInformation.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Nautical information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Nautical information about a related area or facility.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:remarks: The association ref and role are overloaded since the feature association to this object has the same name, but the informationType element distinguishes it. The info->feature association is not allowed in edition 3.0.0. As a result, the multiplicity of informationProvidedFor role must be 0 because an instance may be associated with either feature or information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Recommendations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Recommendations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Regulations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Regulations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Restrictions
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Restrictions for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Feature Type
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Generalized feature type which carries all the common attributes

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Restricted area navigational
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A specified area of land or water designated by an appropriate authority within which access or navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions. A navigational restricted area is an area where the restrictions have a direct impact on the navigation of a vessel in the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Restricted area regulatory
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A specified area of land or water designated by an appropriate authority within which access or navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions. A regulatory restricted area is an area where the restrictions have no direct impact on the navigation of a vessel in the area, but impact on the activities that can take place within the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Routeing measure
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area or line designating the limits or central line of a routeing measure (or part of a routeing measure). Routeing measures include traffic separation schemes, deep-water routes, two-way routes, archipelagic sea lanes, and fairway systems.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: (1) categoryOfNavigationLine permitted only if categoryOfRouteingMeasure is 4 (recommended route). (2) categoryOfTrafficSeparationScheme permitted only if categoryOfRouteingMeasure = 5 (traffic separation scheme)

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Text Placement
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: The Text Placement feature is used in association with the Feature Name attribute or a light description to optimise text positioning in ECDIS.
